INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lemon
)

SET(DEMOS
  arg_parser_demo
  graph_to_eps_demo
  lgf_demo
)

FOREACH(DEMO_NAME ${DEMOS})
  ADD_EXECUTABLE(${DEMO_NAME} ${DEMO_NAME}.cc)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${DEMO_NAME} lemon)
ENDFOREACH()
